data.lyric:
[ti:Until I Bleed Out (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Until I Bleed Out (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:10.32]Lyrics by：Notinbed/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Leland Tyler Wayne/Daniel Lopatin/Mejdi Rhars
[00:20.65]Composed by：Notinbed/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Leland Tyler Wayne/Daniel Lopatin/Mejdi Rhars
[00:30.98]I can't move I'm so paralyzed
[00:41.72]I'm so paralyzed
[00:45.94]And I can't explain why I'm terrified
[00:57.09]I'm so terrified
[01:01.11]Well I don't wanna touch the sky no more
[01:11.27]I just wanna feel the ground when I'm coming down
[01:15.47]It's been way too long
[01:18.74]And I don't even wanna get high no more
[01:23.20]I just want it out of my life
[01:26.37]Out of my life out
[01:29.69]I wanna cut you outta my dreams
[01:38.76]'Til I'm bleeding out
[01:42.44]'Til I'm bleeding
[01:45.20]I wanna cut you outta my mind
[01:53.98]'Til I'm bleeding out
[01:57.80]'Til I'm bleeding
[02:00.36]I wanna cut you outta my dreams
[02:09.39]Woah I'm bleeding out
[02:13.17]Girl I'm bleeding
[02:15.71]I wanna cut you outta my mind
[02:25.45]'Cause I'm bleeding out
[02:28.55]Oh I'm bleeding
[02:32.30]Girl I'm bleeding
[02:39.71]I keep telling myself I don't need it
[02:47.18]I keep telling myself I don't need it anymore
[02:54.79]I keep telling myself I don't need it anymore
[03:02.48]Need it anymore
data.trans:
[ti:Until I Bleed Out (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.32]//
[00:20.65]//
[00:30.98]我动弹不得 麻木不已
[00:41.72]我没有任何感觉
[00:45.94]我无法解释我为什么害怕
[00:57.09]我惶恐不安
[01:01.11]我不想再腾上云霄
[01:11.27]我只想脚踏实地好好生活
[01:15.47]饱受折磨太久太久
[01:18.74]我不想再堕落下去
[01:23.20]我只想让它从我的生活中消失
[01:26.37]从我的生活中消失
[01:29.69]我不想再让你成为我的梦魇
[01:38.76]直到我鲜血横流
[01:42.44]直到我鲜血汩汩
[01:45.20]我想把你从我脑海中抹去
[01:53.98]直到我鲜血横流
[01:57.80]直到我鲜血汩汩
[02:00.36]我不想再让你成为我的梦魇
[02:09.39]我鲜血横流
[02:13.17]女孩 我鲜血汩汩
[02:15.71]我想把你从我脑海中抹去
[02:25.45]因为我鲜血横流
[02:28.55]哦 我鲜血汩汩
[02:32.30]女孩 我鲜血汩汩
[02:39.71]我一直告诉自己我不需要它
[02:47.18]我一直告诉自己我不再需要它了
[02:54.79]我一直告诉自己我不再需要它了
[03:02.48]不再需要它了
